description: A one pot chicken casserole with light seasoning and plenty of crunchy veg.
keywords: Casserole,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Capsicum Casserole with Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 medium chicken breasts, no skin or bone and diced
3 medium capsicum, mixed colours, de-seeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a sauce pan to a medium heat and then add the canola oil.
Fry the carrots, onion and garlic for 4 minutes.
Add the chicken to the pan and fry for a further 6 minutes while tossing.
Add the rest of the ingredients to the pan and cook while stirring for 5 minutes.
Transfer everything to an oven safe casserole dish and bake in the oven for 40 minutes before serving.
